payload.notes: Reorder beef_patty to avoid stockout.

action_snapshot.expected_impact: Prevents stockout of beef_patty, ensuring continued service of menu items containing beef patties. Addresses the immediate need indicated by the critically low on-hand quantity.
action_snapshot.reason: Current beef_patty on-hand is critically low at 3 units, representing only 0.02 days of supply, while the average daily use is 166 units. Stockout risk is high, as the days of supply is far below levels that have previously led to stockouts.

payload.notes: Order 830 units of steak immediately to cover demand without risking high waste.

action_snapshot.expected_impact: This action will prevent the stockout of steak in the next 24 hours. It will ensure enough steak to meet demand, even with weekend spikes.
action_snapshot.reason: Steak is currently out of stock with zero days of supply, with stockout risk expected in the next day, while recent usage has been 166 units daily, peaking at 197 units on weekends.

payload.notes: Order 100 units of chicken breast immediately to prevent stockout.

action_snapshot.expected_impact: Addresses potential stockout of chicken breast, maintaining menu availability. Mitigates risk associated with the critical low days of supply and elevated stockout probability.
action_snapshot.reason: Chicken breast days of supply is critically low at 0.34 days, while average daily usage is 49.8 units. Stockout risk is elevated as weekend demand spikes to 59.14 units.

payload.notes: Reduce lettuce order quantity by 10% to avoid exceeding the max safe order quantity of 42 units. requires_approval

action_snapshot.expected_impact: Reducing order quantity will prevent potential waste due to overstocking lettuce. This aligns the inventory with the current declining usage trend.
action_snapshot.reason: Lettuce usage has declined 24.4% week-over-week from 9.09 to 6.87 units, while current on-hand inventory is 56.09 units, representing 6.27 days of supply. Waste spikes have historically occurred when on-hand levels exceed 1.4x the average daily usage.

payload.notes: Reorder 100 units of flour immediately to prevent stockout.

action_snapshot.expected_impact: Preventing a stockout of flour will maintain menu availability and avoid potential customer dissatisfaction. Addresses immediate supply concerns due to low days of supply.
action_snapshot.reason: Flour days of supply are critically low at 1.13 days, while average daily usage has been 33.2 units. Usage declines on weekdays to 27.75 units.

payload.notes: Run a promotion to reduce mozzarella stock by 15% to align inventory with the declining demand.

action_snapshot.expected_impact: Reduce the risk of waste for mozzarella by promoting dishes using the ingredient, better aligning the inventory with declining usage trends. Reduction in waste should be observed.
action_snapshot.reason: Mozzarella inventory shows surplus risk due to declining usage; week-over-week usage is down 24.4% with current on-hand levels at 0.89x daily use. The latest days of supply is 0.82, indicating potential oversupply.

payload.notes: Reduce mozzarella order quantity by 10% to align with the current decline in usage. requires_approval

action_snapshot.expected_impact: Reduce risk of spoilage and overstocking. Reduce waste by aligning the inventory par level with reduced usage
action_snapshot.reason: Mozzarella usage is declining with a week-over-week change of -24.4%. Reduce par level by 10% to account for drop in usage.
